Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui

Class SelectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.SelectionManager

  • public class SelectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of selection managers for managing selections in a diagram.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SelectionManager​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addToSelection​(DiagramComponent component)
      Adds the given component to the selected components in this selection manager.
      DiagramComponent getActiveComponent​()
      Returns the active component for this selection manager.
      PList<DiagramComponent> getSelectedComponents​()
      Returns all components selected by this selection manager.
      java.lang.String getTemporaryLabel​()
      Returns the temporary label for the active component held by this selection manager.
      boolean isSelected​(DiagramComponent component)
      Returns whether or not the given diagram component is currently selected.
      void setActiveComponent​(DiagramComponent activeComponent)
      Sets the active component for this selection manager to the given one.
      void setTemporaryLabel​(java.lang.String label)
      Sets the temporary label for the active component to the given one.
      void unselectAll​()
      Removes all components from the list of selected components held by this manager.

        public SelectionManager​()

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedComponents

        public PList<DiagramComponent> getSelectedComponents​()
        Returns all components selected by this selection manager.
        Returns:
        A list of components in the selection held by this manager.

      • getActiveComponent

        public DiagramComponent getActiveComponent​()
        Returns the active component for this selection manager.
        Returns:
        The active component for this selection manager.

      • setActiveComponent

        public void setActiveComponent​(DiagramComponent activeComponent)
        Sets the active component for this selection manager to the given one.
        Parameters:
        activeComponent - The new active component for this manager.

      • addToSelection

        public void addToSelection​(DiagramComponent component)
        Adds the given component to the selected components in this selection manager. If the given component is already selected, it is activated.
        Parameters:
        component - The component that is to be selected.

      • unselectAll

        public void unselectAll​()
        Removes all components from the list of selected components held by this manager.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected​(DiagramComponent component)
        Returns whether or not the given diagram component is currently selected.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to check for.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given diagram component is currently selected.

      • getTemporaryLabel

        public java.lang.String getTemporaryLabel​()
        Returns the temporary label for the active component held by this selection manager.

      • setTemporaryLabel

        public void setTemporaryLabel​(java.lang.String label)
        Sets the temporary label for the active component to the given one.
        Parameters:
        label - The new temporary label for the active component.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given label is null.
